short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switches between the last 2 active tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily switches between the last two active tabs using the "Alt + Q"  keyboard shortcut ("Option + Q" on macOS). 

If you wish, the keyboard shortcut can always be changed by going to Chrome > Extensions > Keyboard shortcuts.

The idea behind this plugin is to replicate the "Alt + Tab" shortcut for jumping between browser tabs. 

100% safe and private. No tracking and no permissions required to run. Also, completely free.

Once you try it out, this will become your most used shortcut in the system.

---
